patthana15.53:4.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.53:5.1: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.53:5.2: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.53:6.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nanadassanena pahātabbo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
